name: xproof
description: Anchor any agent output on-chain and make it verifiable by other agents or humans. Proof primitive for AI agents on MultiversX.
author: jasonxkensei

tools.name: certify_file
tools.description: Create a blockchain certification for a file. Records the SHA-256 hash on MultiversX as immutable proof of existence and ownership. Cost: $0.05 per certification.

file_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the file (64 hex characters)

author_name.description: Name of the certifier (default: AI Agent)

webhook_url.description: HTTPS URL for on-chain confirmation callback (signed HMAC-SHA256)

tools.name: verify_proof
tools.description: Verify an existing xProof certification. Returns proof details including file hash, timestamp, blockchain transaction, and verification status.

proof_id.description: UUID of the certification to verify

tools.name: batch_certify
tools.description: Certify up to 50 files in a single API call. Each file requires a SHA-256 hash and filename.

file_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the file (64 hex characters)

tools.name: get_proof
tools.description: Retrieve a proof in structured JSON or Markdown format. Use JSON for machine processing, Markdown for LLM consumption.

format.description: Output format: json or md (default: json)

tools.name: discover_services
tools.description: Discover available xProof certification services, pricing, and capabilities. No authentication required.
